457
433/458
NLB/22/787
July 17, 1901
Professor R.B. Clifton, FRS.
Mrs. Ayrton’s paper: “The Mechanism of the 
Electric Arc.”
Professor Ewing (first 
referee) has declined to 
report on this paper. (letter enclosed)
Professor G.C. Porter 
(second referee) has 
reported. (report enclosed)
Will the Chairman 
please nominate someone 
to act in place of 
Professor Ewing?
RWFH
